WorkItem.Description:
I have a problem with colors.
 
I open an Excel 2007 fille with PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007 and try to save it without any transformation, and background colors are transformed. A grey becomes a light green for example.
Don't understand this problem.
 
Il i try to change the background color of a cell with 'FFE6E6E6' for color, in Office i see an white cell, in OpenOffice i see the good color. What is the problem ?
 
Do you think the problem can be MS Office 2008 for Mac ?
